analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Āsavavippayuttaṁ nasāsavaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: āsava vippayuttam na sa āsavam na sanidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca āsava vippayuttaḥ sa āsavaḥ sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: Āsavavippayuttaṁ naanāsavaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto
analyzed: āsava vippayuttam na anāsavam na sanidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca āsava vippayuttaḥ

original: sāsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Gaṇitakena tīṇi.
analyzed: sa āsavaḥ sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka gaṇitakena tīṇi

original: Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: (Āsavavippayuttanasāsavanaanidassanasappaṭighamūlepi purimanayeneva tīṇi pañhā.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: āsava vippayuttana sa āsavana anidassana sappaṭigha mūle pi purima nayena iva tīṇi pañhāḥ hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe aññamaññe ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Āsavavippayuttaṁ naanāsavaṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto
analyzed: āsava vippayuttam na anāsavam na anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca āsava vippayuttaḥ

original: sāsavo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ,
analyzed: sa āsavaḥ anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā eka
